page.title: 14Local Theatre
page.content: {Barby Players The Barby Players are alocal amatuer dramatics society. They perform in the village hall. Their productions are put on for four days, the Wednesday usually being a charity night. This is an evening suit occasion. The players perform two or three plays a year. They have got a very good name and people come from then whole area to watch them. { {The Kilsby Show} This is a show put on once a year by the tennis club. Again it runs for four nights with one night as a charity night. The script is written by local people and can take the form of a pantomime or a continuous play. This is far more of a fun event than the Barby plays but still involves a lot of practice and scenery making.
